body_html:
That is exclusively for ci_build, where we build the cpp optimized protobuf pip package.
That one never gets touched by anything else in our codebase.

Bazel is powerful, it can build a lot of things but IMHO we need to be careful about balancing.
In a perfect world we let bazel build everything it can.
In real life, the more we let bazel build things, the more painful our developer experience is going to be as most developers use 2-core/4-core machines. Together with bazel bugs, building tensorflow from sources becomes more and more painful with more dependencies.
